data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Kirklareli who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kirklareli, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kirklareli, Turkey. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 128 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Kirklareli, Turkey will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Yoruk people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Yoruk people know you.
Father, move the 128 believers in the state of Kirklareli to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Kirklareli prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Kirklareli, Turkey has a population of 340,600.

We estimate Kirklareli has 128 people who might know Jesus, 1,907 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 338,565 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,660 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Kirklareli, Turkey know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
